item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: Hey, if you're reading this, welcome! This is my blog. I'm not sure what to say other than, have a good day!

item.title: RSS Blog is Live!
item.description: Welcome, this is my new RSS blog that I will update now and again. Don't expect daily or even weekly updates, but I will use this from time to time. Who knows what I'll add on here!
